articles.title: Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at Military Parade and Public Procession of Pyongyang Citizens
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Makes Speech at Military Parade and Public Procession of Pyongyang Citizens 
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, made a speech at the military parade and public procession of Pyongyang citizens held on Saturday in celebration of the 70th anniversary of founding of the WPK.
					 The following is its full text:
						
					
					 Heroic officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces,
					
					 Officers and men of the units participating in the military parade held in celebration of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the glorious Workers' Party of Korea,
					
					 Members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and Young Red Guards, 
					
					 Respected Pyongyang citizens,
					
					 Party members and other working people across the country, 
					
					 Overseas compatriots and foreign friends, 
					
					 Comrades, 
					
					 Today, with great pride in and joy of being victors, we are greeting the October holiday, flying high the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea in the sky. 
					
					 For our country and people, October 10 is a meaningful revolutionary holiday when they celebrate the birth anniversary of the genuine vanguard of the revolution, its militant General Staff, which has taken responsibility for their destiny and leads them. 
					
					 Today's grand military parade and public procession will fully display the inexhaustible strength which our Party has built up over the past 70 years by leading the service personnel and people. It will also demonstrate to the whole world the revolutionary spirit of all our service personnel and people who, full of courage and conviction, are advancing towards a bright future, united solidly around the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Availing myself of this meaningful opportunity, when we are proudly looking back upon the sacred history of the Workers' Party of Korea that is resplendent with victory and glory, I would like to extend, reflecting the boundless reverence and loyalty of the millions of members of our Party and all service personnel and people, the noblest respect and infinite glory to the great Comrade Kim Il Sung who founded our glorious Party and the great Comrade Kim Jong Il who is the eternal General Secretary of our dignified Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 My noble respect also goes to the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners, martyrs of the People's Army and other patriotic martyrs who dedicated all their precious things to promoting the development of our Party and the prosperity of the country in loyal support of the great leaders.  
					
					 Our people, with unfailing loyalty to the Party, have tided over all challenges and difficulties in the red revolutionary spirit of Paektu to glorify the 70th anniversary of its founding as a revolutionary, auspicious event, thereby performing unequalled feats of labour and preparing gifts dedicated to their motherly Party. 
					
					 As I am standing in the square of victors, the venue for celebrations, which is brimming over with our people's fervent loyalty, I am so grateful to them for this venue of today which would have been unimaginable separated from them, and at this moment I am seeing the dear people with deep respect.
					
					 Our Party has been able to propel the revolution over the past 70 years without flinching whatever the storms, achieving only victory and glory, because this great people have entrusted their own destiny entirely to it and followed it in faithful support of its cause.
					
					 The history of our Party is just the path travelled by our great people, its might is their might, its greatness is their greatness, and its victory is the victory achieved by them.
					
					 On the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Party I, on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea, extend warm thanks with a deep bow to all the beloved people who have infused our Party with inexhaustible strength and courage and remained faithful to it in every grave period of the revolution, sharing weal and woe with it in overcoming the harsh trials of history by dint of unyielding willpower.
					
					 My heartfelt congratulations and warm thanks go to our trustworthy members of the Party, heroic officers and men of the People's Army and laudable young vanguard, who, in hearty response to the Party's appeal, have worked with patriotic devotion and created one heroic miracle after another shortening ten years to one on all fronts of building a thriving socialist nation, so as proudly to enter the venue of the grand festival of victors.
					
					 At the same time I warmly welcome our overseas compatriots and foreign friends who are here to congratulate our people on this auspicious day.
					
					 Comrades,
					
					 The history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course it has traveled shouldering the destiny of the people and leading the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of the great leaders.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il built ours into an invincible revolutionary party, a genuine political leadership organization, which serves the people and advances in unity with the masses, the first of its kind in history. 
					
					 Since it inscribed a hammer, a sickle and a writing brush in its red flag, our Party has never been separated from the people and advanced the revolution always believing in them as in heaven.
					
					 History records no revolution as ours that has braved at every step the grave trials and adversities decisive of its success in such an arduous and complicated situation. 
					
					 The new Korea was too young, but the US imperialists, hell-bent on world supremacy, forced a devastating war upon it; when we rebuilt the country on the debris with so much effort tightening our belts, they presented a fresh threat of aggression; and when we were trying to develop our national economy, they blocked our road by imposing the sanctions and blockade unprecedented in history.
					
					 Despite all the difficulties, our Party has always charged forward with iron nerves in any adversity, ushered in a new age of epoch-making changes on this land, and scored only great victories.
					
					 In the whirlwind of history, our Party has trusted our great people only, and they have been its only supporters, advisers and assistants.
					
					 The history of the world revolutionary movement teaches the lesson that irrespective of whether it is a ruling one or has a long history, the leadership authority and fighting efficiency of a party do not rise of their own accord nor can it lead the revolution effectively.
					
					 The high authority our Party enjoys today and the great exploits it has performed are the fruition of the brilliant revolutionary ideas and outstanding leadership of the great President and General, who formulated the revolution as the affection for and trust in the people and applied this definition to its building and activities in a thoroughgoing way.
					
					 In having struck its roots deep into the people's mind and served them only with devotion lies the secret of our Party's leading the cause of independence, Songun and socialism without letup in the face of the tribulations of history while maintaining a firm grip on the steering wheel of the revolution.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea is an invincible one that has achieved oneness with the masses of the people.
					
					 In the whole period of leading the revolution, our Party used to call the people first, lend an ear to their opinions, though simple, and draw unquenchable courage from their sincerity whenever it was trying to identify a course it must follow and whenever it faced grave trials.
					
					 The creative strength of the omnipotent masses was the source of the great miracles our Party worked while building a powerful socialist bulwark, independent, self-supporting and self-reliant in national defence, on this land where centuries-old backwardness and poverty had prevailed and ushering in a new era of building a powerful country in the face of pernicious blockade imposed by the imperialists.
					
					 Bearing full responsibility for the political integrity and material and cultural life of the people and taking care of them has been a matter of paramount importance for our Party and a mission it cannot neglect even for a moment. 
					
					 That our Party, even in the worst situation decisive of the country's destiny, has prepared precious seeds and socialist assets for the happiness of the people through painstaking efforts and invariably pursued the people-oriented policies is an expression of the politics of love for the people that can be administered only by our Party that has shouldered the responsibility for their destiny. 
					
					 As our Party has always regarded the masses of the people as the root of its life and as the source of its inexhaustible strength and given top and absolute priority to their interests, our people have followed it believing it as the genuine guiding light of their destiny and as their mother, and a grand flower garden of single-hearted unity has made its proud appearance on this land. 
					
					 Comrades,
					
					 The might of the Workers' Party of Korea which struggles for the people lies in the fact that it has powerful revolutionary armed forces. 
					
					 Our people have keenly realized the truth that a people without arms is destined to become a ruined nation and that their dignity and happiness are guaranteed by revolutionary arms.
					
					 Our Party has always channelled primary efforts into building invincible military strength with which it can creditably defend the security of the people and their lives and property.
					
					 Thanks to our Party's original line of self-reliant defence and Songun politics, the People's Army has been developed into an elite revolutionary army that is capable of defeating any aggressor forces at a stroke, and the all-people and all-country defence system consolidated steadily, with the result that our country has now turned into an impregnable fortress, into a world-class military power. 
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces have always been a powerful treasured sword in defending the country, the revolution and the people, and a mighty vanguard force and shock brigade that takes the lead in the struggle for the country's prosperity and people's happiness. 
					
					 In the course of organically combining defence of the country with socialist construction after putting forward the line of promoting economic construction and building up defence capabilities in parallel, our Party gained valuable experience in radically increasing the overall national strength by itself and at the same time improving the people's standard of living even though it lacked in everything.
					
					 In direct confrontation with the high-handed U.S. imperialists who have fattened themselves through aggression and war, our service personnel and people have inflicted one ignominious defeat after another upon them and are forcefully breaking through the brigandish sanctions and blockade by imperialist forces. Their indomitable spirit and strength of unity strike extreme anxiety and fear into the enemy. 
					
					 Today our Party can proudly state that our revolutionary armed forces are capable of fighting any type of war the U.S. imperialists opt for, and have made full preparations for firmly defending the blue sky over the country and the security of the people.
					
					 Comrades,
					
					 The source of the unique pride for the Workers' Party of Korea is the large contingent of young people who have been trained to shoulder the future of the revolution and the nation. 
					
					 Foreseeing the protracted nature of the revolution in the initial period of its founding, our Party set attaching importance to young people as its strategic line and has trained them into warriors for the implementation of the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The entire Party has paid constant concern to educating young people and boldly tasked the youth league with large projects. Under the trust and affection of the Party that has put them forward as its young vanguard our young people have volunteered in every period of the revolution to serve at the posts for national defence and work in difficult and challenging sectors, and displayed their youthful wisdom and courage to the full. 
					
					 That our revolution is still advancing vigorously filled with unflagging energy and vitality without stagnation and marking time is because it has a steel-strong legion of young people who always march straight forward following the Party. 
					
					 The proud and grand youth monuments in various parts of the country, including the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, which our young people have recently set up by devoting their patriotic sweat and dedicated to the 70th anniversary of Party founding graphically show how the reserve force of the Workers' Party of Korea is being prepared and how the lineage of the Korean revolution is being carried forward. 
					
					 As our Party has spared nothing for young people, our country has now greeted a fresh heyday in the youth movement and is demonstrating its might as the one and only great youth power, in which the youth problem has been solved perfectly. 
					
					 The historical course our Party has travelled leading the Korean revolution to victory through thick and thin eloquently proves that there is nothing to be afraid of and there is nothing impossible if there are a people faithful to their party and a powerful revolutionary army and large contingent of young people. 
					
					 The lifeline of a revolutionary party, its strength and its bright future are dependent on attaching importance to the people, to the army and to young people ? this is just the invaluable summing up of the 70-year history of our Party. 
					
					 By continuing to hold fast to the three-point strategy of attaching importance to the people, to the army and to young people as its foremost weapon, our Party will advance forward vigorously towards final victory and accomplish the Korean revolution. 
					
					 Comrades, 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea organizes and guides all the victories of our people. 
					
					 The infinite glory and invincibility of our Party originate from holding up the great President and General as its eternal leaders and enjoying absolute support and trust of all the Korean people. 
					
					 If our Party is to lead Korea to a bright future, it must invariably defend its revolutionary nature as the party of the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism both in name and in reality and exalt its brilliance in every way. 
					
					 The great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is, in essence, the people-first principle, and the mode of existence of our Party is serving the people. 
					
					 True to the ennobling intentions of the great President and General who administered for the first time in history the politics of prioritizing, respecting and loving the people and devoted their all throughout their lives to the good of the people, our Party will, in the future, too, strive to add glory to the sacred history of the people-first principle. 
					
					 The entire Party will conduct its building and activities only as instructed by the great President and General, and make selfless, devoted efforts for the benefit of the people by thoroughly applying the people-first principle to its overall work, thereby enhancing its fighting efficiency in every way possible. 
					
					 The genuine feature of the Workers' Party of Korea will be expressed in the appearance of the country that is transformed under its leadership and in the looks of the people who always smile happily. 
					
					 The people are the most precious as they constitute the foundation of the country, and nothing is more sacred than their interests. 
					
					 Our Party will cherish the people's sincere loyalty to it as the greatest asset of the revolution and bring earlier everything splendid of the future by shouldering all the burdens and clearing a thorny path for the sake of our brave, resourceful and beautiful people. 
					
					 It will, in the future, too, endeavour to fulfil its heavy yet sacred mission as a motherly party that, full of infinite vitality and untiring zeal, invariably works with affection for the people and devotes its all to their interests. It will also remain boundlessly faithful to its basic duty of taking full responsibility for their destiny whatever the storms. 
					
					 The Korean revolution advances not by dint of any mysterious divine power but on the great strength of our people including the heroic Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's working class who follow and safeguard their Party with a single mind. 
					
					 The Party respects and believes in the people as in heaven and regards them as its mentors, and they boundlessly trust and follow it as they would do their mothers?this single-hearted unity is precisely the true appearance of Korea and the great foundation of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Our officials should imbue their hearts with the Party's intention of respecting the people and its affection for them, be infinitely polite to them and clear a path, whether snowy or muddy, to realize all their wishes.   In this way they can ensure that cheers for the Workers' Party, for the single-hearted unity and for socialism resound throughout the country. 
					
					 It is our Party's belief that all its members, service personnel and working people, regarding their workplaces, military posts and villages as those in the garden of the office of its Central Committee and always sharing their innermost thoughts with it, will fully display their unstained loyalty and patriotism in the efforts to implement its ideas and defend its policies. 
					
					 Comrades, 
					
					 Our Party will make proactive and persevering efforts to bring earlier the bright day of national reunification, the greatest wish of the Korean nation, resolutely frustrating all sorts of obstructive schemes by foreign forces by dint of single-hearted unity and Songun. 
					
					 Comrades, 
					
					 As the working people exist for ever, lasting justice and victory will be ensured by the struggle for the people and together with the people. 
					
					 Regarding as a paragon the noble ideas and achievements of the great President and General, who devoted their whole life to training the people by believing in them as in heaven and exalted the brilliance of Korea, our Party will continue to love the people and fight for them, and strive to translate their beautiful dreams and ideals into reality. 
					
					 Any challenges of history and frantic attempts by the enemy will never check the advance of our service personnel and people, who have achieved oneness with the Party, nor can they slow down the fighting speed of the Korean people, who are rushing forward towards a bright future, regarding the Party's revolutionary ideology and the blizzards of Paektu as the motive power for advance and the red flag of our dignified Party as the sail. 
					
					 The world will see vividly how the Workers' Party of Korea gives full play to the strength and wisdom of our great people and builds a great Paektusan nation, which will be most prosperous and powerful on this planet. 
					
					 As the great Workers' Party of Korea that believes in the people as in heaven, the people who are one and the same with the name of our sacred revolution and its 70 years of victory, is the locomotive leading the revolution and holds the switch weight of history, the avenue of the cause of the Juche revolution will always be adorned with victory and glory. 
					
					 I appeal to all the Party members. 
					
					 Let us all make selfless, devoted efforts for the good of the great people. 
					
					 Long live the great Korean people, united single-heartedly around the invincible party, the Workers' Party of Korea!

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao, Vietnamese Party Delegations
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao, Vietnamese Party Delegations
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had friendly talks respectively with a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party led by Chansy Phosikham, secretary of its Central Committee and chairman of its Organization Committee, and a delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam led by Ha Thi Khiet, secretary of its Central Committee and director of its Mass Movement Department, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Sunday.
					 Ha Thi Khiet said that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties and countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung are given steady continuity even in the complicated international situation.
					
					 The achievements made by the Communist Party and people of Vietnam are associated with the disinterested support of the Korean comrades, he noted, adding that the Vietnamese people always remember this and would invariably boost the friendship and solidarity with the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished the WPK and people of the DPRK greater success in building a thriving nation under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Chansy Phosikham referred to the friendshiply and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by Kaysone Phomvihane and Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He expressed thanks to the party, government and people of the DPRK for their active support to the Lao people's struggle for national salvation and socialist construction in the past.
					
					 The visit to the DPRK provided him an opportunity to know well about it, he said, hoping that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two parties, states and peoples would boost grow strong as the days go by.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Sunday.
					 A floral basket in the name of the delegation was placed before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The participants paid high tribute to them before their statues.
					
					 They made bows to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who lie in state at the palace.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 Liu Yunshan in the visitor's book wrote that the great men will be immortal and their magnanimous images be forever.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation's Sojourn in DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation's Sojourn in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of China led by Liu Yunshan, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau and member of the Secretariat of the C.C., Communist Party of China, visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum.
					 The visitors paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung before his statue.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the sculpture "Victory" in the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War and paid respect to the service persons of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round the Hall "Chinese People's Volunteers" and other halls, being briefed on the fact that the service personnel and people of the DPRK defeated the U.S. imperialists, first of its kind in history under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Liu Yunshan made an entry in the visitor's book.
					
					 The delegation also laid floral baskets at the cemetery of martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers in Anju City, South Phyongan Province and toured the Pyongyang Corn Processing Factory.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Compatriots Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Foreigners and overseas compatriots staying here to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They included a Cuban party and government delegation, a delegation of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, a delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam, congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China and delegations of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. and the International United Confederation of Koreans.
					
					 The visitors paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 At the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state, they made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Grand Performance Given to Mark Birthday of WPK
articles.content:
Grand Performance Given to Mark Birthday of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A grand art performance "Great Party, Rosy Korea" was given with splendor here Sunday to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A floating stage which was set up in the middle of the Taedong River with the Tower of the Juche Idea for a background was peculiarly decorated.
					
					 The river looked more beautiful at night with twelve famous sceneries in the Songun era shown on the electronic displays on both sides of the stage and the multi-color dancing fountain.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party and state officials watched the performance.
					
					 Among the audience were the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and overseas Koreans, delegations and compatriots who visited the socialist homeland on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and delegations and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign delegations visiting the DPRK to take part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies here and their wives, military attaches here and their wives and other foreign guests.
					
					 The performance was given by 10 000 persons including famous former and incumbent artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe, the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe, creators, artistes, teachers and students of art organizations in the army and society and art education institutions.
					
					 The performance was divided into two parts.
					
					 Their repertoire included male solo and chorus "Song of Comradeship" and female solo and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", all-people hymn.
					
					 Among them were 70 and 80 years old singers and instrumentalists.
					
					 The audience broke into enthusiastic applause when the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble, maker of new history of electronic music of Korean style, started playing music "Oh My Country Full of Happiness" and presented famous songs in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 There was an introduction of the creators who remained faithful to the party by producing famous works of the era while the atmosphere of the performance was revved up and fireworks were displayed.
					
					 Artistes of the Wangjaesan Art Troupe presented songs including "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" and modern dances, peculiarly decorating the stage.
					
					 The performance reached its climax with loud chorus "Ode to General Kim Jong Un", monumental hymn in the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 It closed with epilogue "Glory to Our Great Party" and "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu".
					
					 At the end of the performance the fireworks celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the party were displayed. 
					
					 The performance will continue.

articles.title: Reception Given in Russia to Mark WPK's 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Reception Given in Russia to Mark WPK's 70th Birthday
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there on invitation were Melinikov, first deputy speaker of the State Duma of Russia, delegates of the parliament, political parties, government and organizations including the United Russia Party, Communist Party of the Russian Federation, A Just Russia, Liberal Democratic Party, All-Union  Communist Party of Bolsheviks, Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Foreign Ministry, Ministry of Defense, Ministry of Development of Far East, Ministry of Education and Science, Ministry of Culture, Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, Moscow Veterans' Committee, Orchestra of the 21st Century and the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia and media persons.
					
					 Present there were Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Russia, and members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos documenting the undying feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 Melinikov said that over the past 70 years the WPK has led to victory the Korean people's struggle for building a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, postwar rehabilitation and construction, socialist construction and national reunification.
					
					 He wished the WPK bigger successes in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held to Mark 70th WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held to Mark 70th WPK's Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the DPRK to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 In the capital city of Pyongyang youth and students staged dancing parties at the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Arch of Triumph and other places on Sunday, with their great pride and honor of having displayed the might of the great youth power under the guidance of the great Party.
					
					 Those parties started with the melody of "It Is October". 
					
					 The participants merrily danced to the tune of songs "People's Country" and "To the General Star beyond the Clouds", with their yearning for leader Kim Jong Il who strengthened the WPK into the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and into the guiding force for the Songun revolution.
					
					 The festive mood revved up when "Whistling Boy" and other cheerful songs resounded forth.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in all provinces, cities and counties on Saturday.

articles.title: Preparatory Meeting for 2017 Congress Praising Great Persons Held
articles.content:
Preparatory Meeting for 2017 Congress Praising Great Persons Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- A preparatory meeting for the 2017 congress praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu took place here on Sunday.
					 Attending it were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were delegations and personages of friendly and other organizations in different countries who are staying here to participate in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting. They noted that the preparatory committees of different countries for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the WPK and Korea's liberation have widely introduced the personality of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and fully supported the Korean people's struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and justice.
					
					 Saying that 2017 will be of significance as it marks the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as supreme leader of the DPRK, the speakers stressed the need to form in countries and regions preparatory committees for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2017 and hold various celebrations and thus glorify 2017 as an auspicious year common to humankind.
					
					 The meeting declared the start of the worldwide celebrations for 2017 and made public an appeal addressed to the progressive people of the world.

articles.title: Appeal Adopted at Preparatory Meeting for 2017 Congress Praising Great Persons
articles.content:
Appeal Adopted at Preparatory Meeting for 2017 Congress Praising Great Persons
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The participants in the preparatory meeting for the 2017 congress praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu adopted an appeal to the progressive people of the world on Sunday.
					 It is the unanimous desire and will of the world progressives to glorify as an auspicious year common to mankind 2017 marking the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the 5th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as the supreme leader of the DPRK, the appeal said, adding:
					
					 First, let us hold in high esteem and praise the peerlessly great men who ushered in a new era of independence and led the sacred cause for the people's freedom and happiness and peace and prosperity of mankind!
					
					 Let us form regional and national preparatory committees for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star in 2017 and conduct on wide scale colorful activities for praising the great persons of Mt. Paektu in different parts of the world from the next year.
					
					 Second, let us further expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK and vigorously support and encourage the just cause of the Korean people!
					
					 Let us steadily expand and develop the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK through diverse activities for friendly and cultural exchange and fully support the Korean people's building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Third, let us gather in the holy place of Mt. Paektu in significant 2017 to praise the peerlessly great men and accelerate the victorious advance of the cause of human independence!
					
					 Let us hold an international grand gathering praising the great men of Mt. Paektu in 2017 and further incite the atmosphere of celebrations.
					
					 The appeal called for meeting in the holy place of Mt. Paektu in 2017 with pride and honor of having contributed to praising the great men of Mt. Paektu and deepening the friendship with the Korean people.

articles.title: Experience-sharing Meeting of Juche Idea Followers
articles.content:
Experience-sharing Meeting of Juche Idea Followers
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- An experience-swapping meeting of delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations in the world took place at the People's Palace of Culture here on Sunday.
					 Attending it were Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and other delegations and delegates of Juche idea study organizations from different countries and regions.
					
					 On hand were members of the Social Scientists Society of Korea.
					
					 The participants exchanged their achievements and experience gained in the study and dissemination of the Juche idea over the past years and discussed their future action program.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home from Asian Swimming Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home from Asian Swimming Championships
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK athletes returned home Sunday after taking part in the 8th Asian Age Group Swimming Championships.
					 Attending the championships held in Thailand on October 1-7 were at least 180 players from 12 countries and regions, including the DPRK, India, Uzbekistan, Qatar and Japan.
					
					 The DPRK's teenage swimmers bagged one gold and five silver medals in the championships. Han Yong Song placed first in the men's 10m platform diving of Group B (14-15ages).
					
					 They were greeted at Pyongyang Railway Station by officials concerned, players and coaches.

articles.title: S. Korean Internet Paper Hits at U.S. Forces' Illegal Act
articles.content:
S. Korean Internet Paper Hits at U.S. Forces' Illegal Act
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial on Friday to denounce the U.S. military for having illegally used expenses for the upkeep of its forces in south Korea.
					 The editorial said it was disclosed that the upkeep expenses paid by the south Korean "government" for the U.S. military presence had produced interest receipts of hundreds of billions of won for the past 10 years and this money had been used by the U.S. Defence Department.
					
					 It is irrefutably an illegal act, the editorial said, adding that such action of the U.S. forces can never be tolerated.

articles.title: DFRK Founding Proposal Hailed by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
DFRK Founding Proposal Hailed by Overseas Koreans
						
 Tokyo, October 10 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan made public statements on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said that the proposal set forth by President Kim Il Sung is the most realistic and reasonable way for achieving Korea's reunification independently, peacefully and in the principle of great national unity as it calls for founding a federal state through federation of the north and the south while allowing each other's idea and social system in conformity with the country's specific conditions.
					
					 For its validity, the proposal has aroused full support and approval of not only all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad but also progressives of the world supporting peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, he noted. 
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, praised the proposal as a fresh and unique one for national reunification.
					
					 Choe Yong Hae, vice-chairperson of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said the proposal is a grand blueprint showing the path for building a reunified state and it is a precious legacy left by the President for the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by a publishing house in Irkutsk, Russia on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, a speech made by him at the parade for celebrating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced by Foreign Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Speech Introduced by Foreign Bodies
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The full text of the speech made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the inaugural ceremony of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station was posted on the websites of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo and the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on Oct. 5.
					 His photos were also posted on the websites of the organizations of DR Congo and Germany.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of WPK Observed in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Moscow and Khabarovsk and a lecture in Ulyanovsk on Oct. 5 and 6 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK in a speech said the history of the WPK is the one of its experienced and tested brilliant leadership that guided the Korean people along the only road of victory.
					
					 The exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK will be immortal, he added.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory said the WPK has led the Korean revolution and socialist construction as an invincible party. He hoped that the Korean people would celebrate with splendor the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK with bigger success and victory.
					
					 The chairman of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into a dignified and revolutionary, invincible party that achieved the single-minded unity and is absolutely supported by the popular masses.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting in Moscow.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Observed in Britain
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Observed in Britain
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of political parties and organizations of Britain in London on Oct. 3 to mark the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among the participants were personages of the New Communist Party of Britain, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Korean Friendship Association UK and masses.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, praised the WPK for having firmly defended and realized the demand and interests of the popular masses for 70 years since its foundation.
					
					 The WPK has translated the ideals and dreams of the people into realities under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, he said, adding:
					
					 The WPK absolutely supported and trusted by the people will always emerge victorious.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said the WPK has demonstrated victory only as it has been guided by the Juche idea.
					
					 The secretary general of the Korean Friendship Association UK said the DPRK had an access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence under the leadership of the great party to cope with the nuclear threat from the U.S. imperialists, adding that the U.S. nuclear threat can no longer work on the DPRK.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked Abroad
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign bodies held seminars on Oct. 1 and 2 to mark October 10, the founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Among them were the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, the Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK and branches of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia said the Korean people have achieved brilliant successes in the revolution and construction under the leadership of the WPK for the past 70 years.
					
					 It is one of the greatest exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that they developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Angolan preparatory committee said the Korean people have firmly defended their idea and social system from the persistent offensive by the hostile forces to stifle socialism and the DPRK as they are united in one thought and one purpose around their leader.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted that structures for promoting wellbeing of the people have sprung up in various parts of the DPRK thanks to the warm love shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un for the people.

articles.title: WPK Introduced by Venezuelan Organizations
articles.content:
WPK Introduced by Venezuelan Organizations 
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association jointly issued a bulletin on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The bulletin said:
					
					 The WPK's guiding idea is Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the essence of the Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 The Juche idea and Songun idea were founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il who carried forward the idea and cause of the President had thoroughly applied the Juche idea and Songun idea in the Korean revolution during the whole period of leading the WPK.
					
					 The WPK could invariably adhere to the banner of socialism without a slightest deviation thanks to the great Juche idea and Songun idea.
					
					 The Juche idea and Songun idea are being widely recognized by the world progressives as the idea of guiding the cause of human independence.
					
					 The DPRK provided the Korean people with the happy life by pursuing a lot of policies for defending and realizing the interests of the popular masses.
					
					 This is the reality of the DPRK to be followed by the Venezuelan people struggling for building the wonderful future.

articles.title: WPK and Korean People Supported by Egyptian Political Figure
articles.content:
WPK and Korean People Supported by Egyptian Political Figure
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Wahid Al Uksouri, chairman of the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt, issued a statement on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said that the WPK is the powerful party which has led the Korean revolution only to victory and glory for the past 70 years despite the unprecedented arduous and difficult situation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The WPK grown up with its historic root during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle led the social revolution of the two stages to victory after its founding and thus built the socialist power centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					 This was because President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il founded the WPK and steadily strengthened it.
					
					 Availing itself of this opportunity, the Arab Socialist Party of Egypt extends full support and solidarity to the Songun politics of the WPK headed by respected HE Kim Jong Un and its socialist construction and efforts to reunify the country independently without foreign forces' interference.
					
					 Our party will make every effort to steadily strengthen the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK.
					
					 I wish the WPK and the Korean people led by HE Kim Jong Un greater victory and success.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced by Int'l Body
						
 Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted on One Corea Network of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on Oct. 2.
					 The work, published on Oct. 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the road to develop the party into his party for all ages.
